overhead_activities.description: Additional time for project-specific processes and workflows that occur outside core development

database_changes.label: Database Change Management
database_changes.description: Extra time for creating DBA ticket and Confluence documentation when database changes are involved
database_changes.rationale: Process: Create JIRA ticket for DBA to execute manually on test/prod DB + attach to Confluence page
database_changes.notes: Applied once per ticket, regardless of number of DB changes

security_review.label: Security Review Process
security_review.description: Extra time for mandatory security review for auth/permission changes
security_review.rationale: Process: Submit security review request + address findings
security_review.notes: Enable if your organization requires formal security reviews

legal_compliance.label: Legal/Compliance Review
legal_compliance.description: Extra time for legal review of user-facing content or data handling changes
legal_compliance.rationale: Process: Submit to legal team + incorporate feedback
legal_compliance.notes: Enable if your organization requires legal review for certain changes

documentation_update.label: Documentation Update
documentation_update.description: Extra time for updating user-facing documentation or API docs
documentation_update.rationale: Process: Update docs in wiki/confluence/readme + request review
documentation_update.notes: Enable if documentation updates are tracked separately from code

cross_team_coordination.label: Cross-Team Coordination
cross_team_coordination.description: Extra time for coordinating with other teams (DevOps, infrastructure, operations, platform, etc.)
cross_team_coordination.rationale: Process: Create coordination tickets + discuss deployment/removal process + explain changes + get approvals
cross_team_coordination.notes: Enable if cross-team coordination is required for infrastructure, deployment, or operational tasks

notes: Overhead activities are detected automatically based on keywords
Multiple overheads can apply to a single ticket
Teams should customize keywords and times based on their processes
Disable activities that don't apply to your workflow

manual_time_adjustments.description: Detect and apply explicit time adjustments specified in ticket title or description

patterns.example: ensure qa automation run is not affected (+4h)

notes: Patterns are checked in order; first match wins per occurrence
All matches are summed together for total adjustment
Manual adjustments are added on top of calculated estimates and overhead
Use parentheses format (+Xh) to clearly indicate additional time
Hours (h/hours) and minutes (m/min/minutes) are supported
Decimal values supported: +2.5h, +1.5 hours

file_touch_overhead.description: Additional time for touching many files in manual development (navigation, context switching, mechanical overhead)

complexity_scaling.description: More complex changes require more time per file

notes: Only applies to manual workflow - AI can batch process files efficiently
Base time per file represents: opening file, reading context, understanding dependencies, making change
Complexity scaling: Low complexity (simple find/replace) vs High complexity (architectural changes)
Set minimum_files_for_overhead to avoid applying to small tasks
Maximum overhead prevents runaway estimates for very large refactors
This overhead is added to implementation phase in manual workflow only

examples.rationale: Large refactor affecting 60 files with high complexity

scoring_guide.9-10: Highly complex algorithms, distributed systems, performance critical

scoring_guide.9-10: E2E tests, performance tests, complex scenarios

scoring_guide.5-6: Some new tech or unclear requirements
scoring_guide.9-10: Unfamiliar tech, major unknowns, breaking changes

workflow_calculation.description: How to calculate workflow phase times based on project type and complexity
notes: Each project type defines its own workflow phases in project_types section

Implementation phase uses task-type-specific base units
Testing is typically a percentage of implementation time

low.description: Significant ambiguity, unfamiliar technology, major unknowns
